name: Gold Ring
skill: Restores 1325/1625 HP to all allies. Targets receive 30%/37% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Sharply increases the number of soulstones received from battle.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a ring made of gold. She's also a collector of rings, but only those that bestow special powers when worn. Oddly enough, these powers vary depending on the finger on which you wear the ring, like a ring worn on your ring finger bestowing you with luck in love. Once other spirits—especially female spirits—found out about this her reputation skyrocketed, and she now operates as both a collector and buyer.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 17/05/17- 07/06/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 04/06/17 - 07/06/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points by 33% during the "Romance of the Demon and Sword" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 17/05/17- 07/06/17

summon: "On which finger will you wear your ring?"
